We are interested in ﬁnding vectors ˜x ∈ RD, which live in lower-
dimensional subspace U ⊆RD, dim(U) = M, so that
˜x=

is as similar to xas possible. Note that at this point we need to assume
that the coordinates zm of ˜xand ζm of xare not identical.
In the following, we use exactly this kind of representation of ˜xto ﬁnd
